cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest, then northwest toward the North Carolina/South Carolina coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Cape Fear–Cape Lookout area of North Carolina

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch: Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC and north of Duck NC to the NC/VA border.  Hurricane Watch: Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC and north of Duck NC to the NC/VA border.  Tropical Storm Watch: NC/VA border to Cape Charles Light VA and Chesapeake Bay south of New Point Comfort.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm Surge & Hurricane Warning: South Santee River SC to Duck NC including Albemarle and Pamlico Sounds.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Coastal areas from South Carolina through Virginia, with hazardous swell and rain potential extending northward into the Mid-Atlantic states.
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤11%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; gusts could reach 30–40 mph late weekend.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected above minor tidal departures along the New Jersey coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Potential for 3–6 inches of rain Sunday–Monday with localized higher totals causing urban and river flooding.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Large swells and dangerous rip currents; possible upstream river flooding that could disrupt barge traffic and terminal access.
